name: Stages (cjshaw)
description:
Stages is an art game meant to express the feelings behind the five stages of grief in an abstract form. Each level simulates a different stage, with the goal being to reach the final stage (acceptance) and work through the challenges presented with each other stage.

To play, run the .exe and follow the instructions. To navigate levels, WASD moves the character, shift enables sprinting, and spacebar is used to jump.
